hero.title: Create
hero.subtitle: The most complete platform for generating, customizing and managing QR codes. With advanced analytics and professional features.

analytics.title: Professional Analytics Dashboard
analytics.subtitle: See exactly how your QR codes are performing with beautiful, actionable insights
analytics.overviewCaption: Complete analytics overview with scans over time and performance metrics
analytics.geographicDesc: See where your audience is located with interactive city and country breakdowns
analytics.performanceDesc: Track which QR codes perform best and optimize your campaigns accordingly
analytics.cta: Get Started with QR Code Analytics

qrTypes.title: QR Code Types
qrTypes.subtitle: Create QR codes for any purpose with our specialized types

comparison.title: Static vs Dynamic QR Codes
comparison.subtitle: Understand the differences and choose the right type for your needs

static.title: Static QR Codes
static.description: Data is encoded directly into the QR code pattern. Once created, it cannot be modified.
static.feature1Desc: Works forever without relying on servers
static.limitation: Cannot be edited after creation and do not include analytics.

dynamic.title: Dynamic QR Codes
dynamic.description: They redirect through a short URL you can change at any time. Includes full analytics.
dynamic.feature1Desc: Change the destination without reprinting the code
dynamic.advantage: Perfect for marketing campaigns where you need flexibility and data.

customization.title: Full Customization
customization.subtitle: Make your QR codes perfectly reflect your brand

colors.title: Custom Colors
colors.description: Change the QR code colors to match your brand

shapes.title: Shapes and Styles
shapes.description: Customize the appearance of QR code modules

logo.title: Center Logo
logo.description: Add your logo in the center of the QR code

frames.title: Frames and Text
frames.description: Add decorative frames with custom text

security.title: Security and Reliability
security.subtitle: Your information and your users' information is protected
security.cloudDesc: Your codes are safely stored in Firebase

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses already using Lady QR to grow their business. Start free and upgrade when you need it.

login.linkSentDesc: We've sent you a sign-in link. Click the link in your email to continue.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Plans designed for modern businesses
pricing.description: Start free and upgrade as your business grows. All plans include professional support and multiple payment methods.
pricing.currentPlanDesc: You are currently subscribed to the {{plan}} plan
pricing.downgradeWarningMessage: You currently have {{count}} QR codes. Downgrading to Free will deactivate all except your most recent QR code. The deactivated codes will be archived and can be reactivated if you upgrade again.
pricing.errorNotAvailable: This plan is not available for online purchase. Please contact us.
pricing.successDowngrade: Successfully downgraded to free plan. Your most recent QR code has been kept active.

confirmPause.title: Pause QR Code?
confirmPause.message: This QR code will stop redirecting. You can resume it anytime.

confirmResume.title: Resume QR Code?
confirmResume.message: This QR code will start redirecting again.

confirmDelete.title: Delete QR Code?
confirmDelete.message: This action cannot be undone. All analytics data will be permanently deleted.
